name: SWARM OF RATS
size_type_alignment: Medium Swarm of Tiny Beasts, Unaligned

traits.name: Swarm
traits.text: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

actions.name: Bites
actions.text: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (2d4) Piercing damage, or 2 (1d4) Piercing damage if the swarm is Bloodied.

raw_text:

Traits
Swarm. The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and
the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The
swarm can’t regain Hit Points or gain Temporary Hit Points.

Hit: 5 (2d4) Piercing damage, or 2 (1d4)
Piercing damage if the swarm is Bloodied.
